amendment.description: To establish procedures for grants for State and local programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4614 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4614 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S7389-7390; text: CR S7389-7390) To establish procedures for grants for State and local programs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4614 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
